second-section.new-1-desc: Congratulations to our students and their parents

third-section.teachers-desc: Meet our dedicated team of educators who strive to provide the highest quality of education and support for students.

fourth-section.about_desc: Our school is committed to providing high-quality education, supporting students in their pursuit of knowledge and development.

footer.footer-desc: Providing quality education since 1998. Developing knowledge, creativity, and character.
footer.news-desc: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates and news.

welcome.title: About Our School
welcome.desc1: Our school has been providing quality education since 1998. We focus on developing not only academic knowledge but also critical thinking, creativity, and social skills in our students.
welcome.desc2: We believe that every student has unique talents and abilities, and our mission is to help them discover and develop these talents to their fullest potential

items.title: Modern Classrooms
items.desc: Equipped with the latest technology to enhance the learning experience.

items.title: Library
items.desc: A vast collection of books, digital resources, and quiet study spaces.

items.title: Computer Labs
items.desc: State-of-the-art computer labs with the latest software and hardware.

items.title: Sports Facilities
items.desc: Indoor and outdoor sports facilities for various activities and physical education.

members.name: John Smith
members.desc: With over 20 years of experience in education, Mr. Smith leads our school with vision and dedication.

members.name: Maria Johnson
members.desc: Dr. Johnson oversees our academic programs, ensuring high standards and innovative teaching methods.

members.name: Robert Davis
members.desc: Mr. Davis coordinates student activities and ensures a supportive environment for all students.

help.desc: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have.

meeting.desc: Book a meeting with our counselors or administrators to discuss your concerns in person.

chat.desc: Chat with our support team during school hours for immediate assistance with your questions.

study.title: Education
study.desc: Our school offers a comprehensive educational program designed to develop well-rounded students with a solid academic foundation and practical skills.

chess.title: Chess Club
chess.desc: Develop strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.

music.title: Music Club
music.desc: Explore instruments, singing and music theory in a creative environment.

art.title: Art Club
art.desc: Hands-on workshops in drawing, painting and mixed media.

sports.title: Sports Club
sports.desc: Team sports, fitness and physical education activities.

theater.title: Theater Club
theater.desc: Acting, script work and stage production experience.

science.title: Science Club
science.desc: Experiments and projects to foster curiosity and scientific thinking.

rulesPage.title: School Rules and Policies
rulesPage.desc: Our school policies ensure a safe and effective learning environment for all students.

attendance.title: Attendance
attendance.desc: Students are expected to attend all classes regularly and on time.

behavior.title: Behavior
behavior.desc: Respectful and responsible behavior is expected from all students at all times.

integrity.title: Academic Integrity
integrity.desc: Cheating, plagiarism, and academic dishonesty are strictly prohibited.

dressCode.title: Dress Code
dressCode.desc: Students must adhere to the school dress code to maintain a respectful environment.

technology.title: Technology Use
technology.desc: Devices may only be used for educational purposes with teacher permission.

healthSafety.title: Health & Safety
healthSafety.desc: Students must follow health and safety rules both in and outside the classroom.

extracurricular.title: Extracurricular Activities
extracurricular.desc: Participation in extracurriculars requires maintaining academic and behavioral standards.

communication.title: Communication
communication.desc: Parents and students are encouraged to communicate openly with teachers and staff.

charter.title: School Charter
charter.desc: Outlines the mission, values, and vision of our school.

handbook.title: Student Handbook
handbook.desc: Detailed information about rules, procedures, and policies.

parent.title: Parent Guidelines
parent.desc: Resources and rules for effective parent-school collaboration.

calendar.title: Academic Calendar
calendar.desc: Stay updated with school events, holidays, and key dates.

enrollment.title: Enrollment Policy
enrollment.desc: Requirements and rules for enrolling students.

newsPage.title: School News
newsPage.desc: Stay updated with the latest news, events, and announcements from our school community.
